snippet: In the last seven years, 29 state officeholders have been convicted of a crime, censured or otherwise accused of wrongdoing, the New York Public Interest Research Group said.
lead_paragraph: In the last seven years, 29 state officeholders have been convicted of a crime, censured or otherwise accused of wrongdoing, the New York Public Interest Research Group said.

headline.seo: With Senator Smith’s Arrest, Yet Another Corruption Case for Albany
headline.main: For Albany, Yet Another Corruption Case
headline.print_headline: For Albany, Yet Another Corruption Case
